ygData.subject: Re: Re: The Brass Kilij and the silly little sand giant
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure if that s correct..  I don t recall what it  said when it was alive - but I checked the screenshot I took of yours truly looting the plans (available
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure if that's correct.. I don't recall what it said when it was
alive - but I checked the screenshot I took of yours truly looting the plans
(available at http://www.users.uswest.net/~asuoja/Proof.jpg) and it's "a
sand giants corpse")

We were able to tell by conn'ing at our level..

Slyde

----- Original Message -----
From: Eric Boller <eboller@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 8:55 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: The Brass Kilij and the silly little sand giant


> From: Eric Boller <eboller@...>
>
> I've heard that that sand giant in question appears as
> just "sand giant"--not "a sand giant". That is how
> your friend could tell, I believe. Having not found
> that stupid sand giant, I can't verify as of yet.
>
> Thex Luteslinger (Tunare)
>
> >
> > No, not really. I just know when I see him he's
> > blue instead of white or
> > yellow. However, I zoned into SRo the other day and
> > saw a blue SG. A 33rd
> > DE Necro girlfriend was with me and I said "Hey
> > there he is! Let's toast
> > him!" and she said "That's not him." How she knew I
> > don't know because he
> > was blue to her too. I'll ask her tonight if I
> > remember to.
> >
> > Crier Sharpsong
> >
>
